movie.title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
movie.description_intro: Scott Carey and his wife Louise are sunning themselves on their cabin cruiser, the small craft adrift on a calm sea. While his wife is below deck, a low mist passes over him. Scott, lying in the sun, is sprinkled with glittery particles that quickly evaporate. Later he is accidentally sprayed with an insecticide while driving and, in the next few days, he finds that he has begun to shrink. First just a few inches, so that his clothes no longer fit, then a little more. Soon he is only three feet tall, and a national curiosity. At six inches tall he can only live in a doll's house and even that becomes impossible when his cat breaks in. Scott flees to the cellar, his wife thinks he has been eaten by the cat and the door to the cellar is closed, trapping him in the littered room where, menaced by a giant spider, he struggles to survive.

Scott, lying in the sun, is sprinkled with glittery particles that quickly evaporate. First just a few inches, so that his clothes no longer fit, then a little more. Soon he is only three feet tall, and a national curiosity. At six inches tall he can only live in a doll's house and even that becomes impossible when his cat breaks in. Scott flees to the cellar, his wife thinks he has been eaten by the cat and the door to the cellar is closed, trapping him in the littered room where, menaced by a giant spider, he struggles to survive.

movies.title: The Pact II
movies.summary: A woman who is plagued by nightmares involving a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.
movies.description_full: A woman who is plagued by nightmares involving a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.
movies.synopsis: A woman who is plagued by nightmares involving a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.

movies.title: Violent Life
movies.summary: Tommaso Puzzilli is a boy who grew up in the suburb of Pietralata outside Rome. Not having a job, Tommaso and his friends are committing crimes to make money.
movies.description_full: Tommaso Puzzilli is a boy who grew up in the suburb of Pietralata outside Rome. Not having a job, Tommaso and his friends are committing crimes to make money.

movies.title: Carmilla
movies.summary: An atmospheric, coming-of-age love story steeped in eerie mystery and inspired by the gothic novel of the same name.
movies.description_full: An atmospheric, coming-of-age love story steeped in eerie mystery and inspired by the gothic novel of the same name.
movies.synopsis: An atmospheric, coming-of-age love story steeped in eerie mystery and inspired by the gothic novel of the same name.

movies.title: Cat Run 2
movies.summary: Gritty and action-packed, Cat Run 2 stars the seductive Winter Ave Zoli (Sons of Anarchy), as a high-end call girl with a secret military connection. Better than ever, Scott Mechlowicz and Alphonso McAuley return as Anthony and Julian, the unlikely team of bumbling, up-and-coming private detectives. After a "sex party" turned massacre leaves Julian's cousin in trouble, the wannabe detective team takes on the case and discovers a military secret they wish they hadn't. This sexy, thrilling, epic will leave you at the edge of your seat!
